<!--
If you wish to share code, please use indentation and syntax highlighting.
The easier an issue is to read, the faster you will get an answer.

DON'T DO:
```
function test() {
for (const i of [1, 2, 3]) {
console.log(i);
}
}
```

DO:
```typescript
function test() {
  for (const i of [1, 2, 3]) {
    console.log(i);
  }
}
```
-->
